show_name: Digimon Tamers Movie 6: The Runaway Digimon Express
other_title: Digimon Tamers: Explosion of the Digimon Express
Digimon Tamers: Reckless Driving - Digimon Super-Express
デジモンテイマーズ 暴走デジモン特急 (Japanese)
數碼寶貝 暴走特急 (Chinese (Taiwan))
plot: Locomon, a train digimon, has suddenly appeared in the real world. All the tamers scramble to stop the train before it reaches its final destination: the portal into the Digital world.
opening_theme: "A World For Us All" by Chris Horvath [English Version]
